divs: Sighting Detailsme and my mom and dad were sitting in the yard star gazeing and saw what we thought was a shooting star coming straightdown towards the mountain and it made a right angle turn at the top of the mountin and coutinued for a few seconds before dissapearing this happend two more times in about a hour being six years old at the time i really didnt know what i had seen but my dad was in the army and couldnt explane what we had witnessed my mother is still alive and some times we talk about that night
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rudy
This sighting has never been favorited.
